title: COVID-19 unrest has created 'explosive' situation in Guadeloupe, says Macron
content:
1. COVID-19 unrest has created 'explosive' situation in Guadeloupe, says Macron  Reuters
  2. France to send special forces to Guadeloupe after looting, arson  Al Jazeera English
  3. 'I lost everything': Guadeloupe riots overtake COVID protest  foxnews.com
  4. Island anger: Guadeloupe closes schools after COVID rioting  ABC News
  5. Third night of violence in Guadeloupe as France sends police special forces  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: COVID-19の騒動はグアドループに「爆発的」な状況をもたらした、とマクロン大統領は言う。
马克龙说，COVID-19动乱在瓜德罗普岛造成了 "爆炸性 "局势
馬克龍說，COVID-19動亂在瓜德羅普島造成了 "爆炸性 "局勢
